summary: Frontend testing completed successfully for Firmanager app updates. All 9 requested features verified: 1) App name changed to 'Firmanager' in sidebar and login, 2) Dashboard shows customers count, employees, monthly summary, upcoming tasks, recent activity, 3) Results page has 4 tabs (Oversikt, Intern Resultater, PA Resultater, Bedrift Inntjening), 4) Results page shows 3 categories with correct calculations, 5) Internal page has edit and delete buttons for each order, 6) Internal page has multi-select delete functionality, 7) Route planner has area filter input, 8) Route planner shows customer selection after selecting areas, 9) Fakturagrunnlag modal has scroll functionality.
critical_code_review_comments: App name correctly changed from ServicePro to Firmanager in Login.js and Layout.js
Dashboard.js properly displays: Totalt kunder, Ansatte, Månedsoppsummering, Kommende oppgaver, Siste aktivitet
Results.js has 4 tabs with correct content: Oversikt, Intern Resultater, PA Resultater, Bedrift Inntjening
Internal.js has edit/delete buttons per row and multi-select delete with 'Slett valgte' button
Routes.js has area filter with postnr/poststed/kommune search and customer selection
Invoicing.js modal has max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto for scroll functionality
seed_data_creation: Used existing data: 1072 customers, 22 internal orders, 1 work order
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested updates verified. App renamed to Firmanager. Dashboard has comprehensive info. Results page has 4 tabs for different result categories. Internal page has edit/delete per row and multi-select delete. Route planner has area filter with geo-optimization. Fakturagrunnlag modal has scroll.

dashboard.monthly_summary: PASS - Shows 'Månedsoppsummering' with arbeidsordre, fullført, planlagt, timer, km

tabs.intern_resultater: PASS - Tab visible, shows 'Intern Resultater - Intern Timesats'
tabs.pa_resultater: PASS - Tab visible, shows 'PA Resultater - Provisjon/Andel'
tabs.bedrift_inntjening: PASS - Tab visible, shows 'Tjenester (Satsbasert)' and 'Leverandør Satser'

results_page.categories: PASS - Shows Intern, PA, and Bedrift Inntjening calculations

internal_page.edit_buttons: PASS - Found 22 edit buttons with data-testid='edit-internal-{id}'
internal_page.delete_buttons: PASS - Found 22 delete buttons with data-testid='delete-internal-{id}'
internal_page.multi_select: PASS - Checkboxes work, 'Slett valgte' button appears with count

route_planner.area_selection: PASS - Clicking suggestion adds area tag
route_planner.customer_selection: PASS - Shows 'Velg kunder' with customer list after area selection

fakturagrunnlag_modal.scroll_functionality: PASS - Modal has max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto classes
